description:
Be pain free now through self hypnosis teaches you to reduce,heal,manage and eliminate physical and mental pain completely from your life using simple and powerful self hypnosis and visualization techniques.

This course is ideal for surgeons and dentists who have to deal with pain management of patients . Powerful exercises and techniques have been taught to manage your pain better and have self control over your body.

This course includes-

1) Introduction

2) Self hypnosis and visualization to heal your pain -1

3) Self hypnosis and visualization to heal your pain-2

4) Change your words to heal your pain

5) Be aware of your pain

6) few more techniques to reduce and manage your pain

7) Bonus techniques
title: Be Pain free now through self hypnosis
